actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A bill to require the head of each Federal administrative and executive agency to conduct a review of agency regulations, to rewrite current regulations with sex-based distinctions, and to refrain from promulgating future regulations which contain gender-based distinctions.

summary.text: Requires the head of each executive agency to conduct a review of all rules, regulations, and policies of the agency which result in different treatment based on gender. Directs each agency head to report annually to the Congress on such review. Provides that such report shall include proposals to make agency rules and regulations neutral as to sex. Requires all agency rules, regulations, and programs to the extent practicable be neutral as to sex.

titles.title: A bill to require the head of each Federal administrative and executive agency to conduct a review of agency regulations, to rewrite current regulations with sex-based distinctions, and to refrain from promulgating future regulations which contain gender-based distinctions.
